FuncDef:
The active port-l3vpn command activates L3VPN interface licenses for a board in batches.
The undo active port-l3vpn command deactivates L3VPN interface licenses for a board in batches.
By default, L3VPN interface licenses are not activated for a board.
CLIs: undo active port-l3vpn slot <slot-id> card <card-id> [ port <port-list> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a subcard ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 20.

Specifies the interface list of a board, with the interfaces separated by commas (,) or hyphens (-).
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the slot ID of a board.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The L3VPN service can be configured on a board only after L3VPN interface licenses are activated for the board.
Prerequisites
Before configuring L3VPN interface licenses for a board, complete the following tasks:
Run the license active command to activate the license file on the main board.Run the active port-basic command to activate basic hardware licenses for interfaces on a board in a batch.

Precautions
This command applies only to the Admin-VS.
